description: Sorts an array using Selection Sort algorithm
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: SelectionSort.c
Compile: gcc SelectionSort.c -o SelectionSort
Run: ./SelectionSort

description: Sorts an array using Insertion Sort algorithm
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: InsertionSort.c
Compile: gcc InsertionSort.c -o InsertionSort
Run: ./InsertionSort

description: Sorts an array using Merge Sort algorithm (Divide and Conquer)
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: MergeSort.c
Compile: gcc MergeSort.c -o MergeSort
Run: ./MergeSort

description: Sorts an array using Quick Sort algorithm
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: QuickSort.c
Compile: gcc QuickSort.c -o QuickSort
Run: ./QuickSort

program_name: Singly Linked List - Create and Display
description: Creates a singly linked list and displays elements
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: LinkedListCreateDisplay.c
Compile: gcc LinkedListCreateDisplay.c -o LinkedListCreateDisplay
Run: ./LinkedListCreateDisplay

description: Implements stack operations using array (push & pop)
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: StackArray.c
Compile: gcc StackArray.c -o StackArray
Run: ./StackArray
output:
Pushed: 10
Pushed: 20
Pushed: 30
Stack: 30 20 10
Popped: 30
Stack: 20 10

description: Implements queue operations using array (enqueue & dequeue)
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: QueueArray.c
Compile: gcc QueueArray.c -o QueueArray
Run: ./QueueArray
output:
Enqueued: 10
Enqueued: 20
Enqueued: 30
Queue: 10 20 30
Dequeued: 10
Queue: 20 30

instruction:
How to Run:
Save: ATMSimulation.c
Compile: gcc ATMSimulation.c -o ATMSimulation
Run: ./ATMSimulation
output:

1. Check Balance
2. Deposit
3. Withdraw
Enter choice: 1
Balance = 10000.00
